## Bio

<br>

Dr Tom Hardwicke is a Senior Lecturer at the School of Psychology, University of Sydney. He received his PhD in Experimental Psychology from University College London in 2016 and subsequently completed post-doctoral fellowships at Stanford University, Charité — Universitätsmedizin Berlin, the University of Amsterdam, and the University of Melbourne. Tom works at the intersection of psychology and meta-research (‘research-on-research’) on projects related to transparency, bias, peer review, scientific criticism, and reproducibility. Since January 2024, Tom is Senior Editor for Statistics, Transparency, and Rigour at the journal Psychological Science.
